item.title: Mentioned by Canada.com
item.description:
Federal department needs to 'come clean' about data breach, NDP says
NDP digital issues critic Charmaine Borg says the conflicting details about the timeline of events inside Human Resources and Skills Development Canada after it lost a hard drive containing names, addresses and social insurance numbers of Canada Student Loan borrowers raise more questions about how truthful officials have been about the data loss.
